title: Minneapolis school shooting updates: FBI investigating attack as domestic terrorism and hate crime against Catholics - latest
summary: FBI Director Kash Patel addressed the media regarding a tragic incident where a gunman killed two children at a church school. However, the local police chief declined to speculate on the motive behind the attack. Investigations are ongoing as authorities seek to understand the circumstances surrounding the tragedy.

title: DC mayor says she ‘greatly appreciates’ Trump’s surge of federal officers but adds there is ‘break in trust’ with residents – live
summary: Muriel Bowser stated that she and the president did not discuss any potential plans for a federal takeover extension. Such an extension would require congressional approval. This clarification suggests no immediate action is being taken on the issue.
